CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1945, pg.13 reads: "Three Lovely Ladies - Dressed in height of fashion, these lovelies are three of Pittsburgh's finest. Left to right: Mrs. Edith Moore, Mrs. Helen Bolden and Mrs. Dorothy Sharp. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Edith Moore, Helen Bolden, and Dorothy Anderson Sharpe wearing mink stoles, standing in front of brick building
